column4: Your adapter in the laptop may not be broadcasting with as much power as it could. If the adapter supports the txpower directive in iwconfig, you can try to make it use more
What would be a 'normal' txpower command?
not command, but value is a better choice
The value is dependant on your hardware. The best thing is to look up the spec sheet of your internal wifi adapter and see what it's max transmit power is in decibels, which is the number then to use
